Title: Homebrew's zero tolerance policy for toxic behavior
Author: GitHub
Description:
Why does Homebrew have such a strict policy against unpleasant behavior? Mike McQuaid addresses his reputation as a "controversial" figure and explains why protecting unpaid maintainers from toxicity is more important than keeping every user happy.

#Homebrew #OpenSource #Maintainer
